name:
Inisheltia / Clynagh and flood E/W.

**Dunmanus Island**
description:
Inisheltia / Clynagh and flood E/W.

Dunmanus Island L934-358 Sheet 45 This small island lies between the two embarkation points in this part of the bay. Indeed it is part of their story. A road was planned from one side of the bay to the other across the narrows hereabouts, and there remains visible evidence on the island. The remains of a strong wall / road is to be seen on this pleasant island, otherwise unremarkable except for sheep and mallard. Local lore insists that building this bridge will mean the end of the world.
